object.script:
/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Server Version : SQL Server 2022 ($(ServerVersion)) Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft SQL Server Enterprise Edition Source Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2012 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
SET ARITHABORT ON SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET ANSI_PADDING ON SET ANSI_WARNINGS ON SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.indexes WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[TableWithSelectiveXmlIndex]') AND name = N'SXI_Index') CREATE SELECTIVE XML INDEX [SXI_Index] ON [dbo].[TableWithSelectiveXmlIndex] ( [xmlCol] ) WITH XMLNAMESPACES ( 'www.w3.org' as xmlnmsps1, 'onlinebookstore' as xmlnmsps2 )
FOR ( [nodePath0] = '/book/title/text()', [nodePath1] = '/book/id1' as XQUERY 'xs:string' MAXLENGTH (10), [nodePath2] = '/book/id2' as XQUERY 'node()' SINGLETON, [nodePath3] = '/book/price' as SQL [float], [SmoBaselineVerification_IndexedXmlPath] = '/book/name' as SQL [nvarchar](30) ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = OFF, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = OFF)

/* ==Scripting Parameters==
Source Server Version : SQL Server 2022 ($(ServerVersion)) Source Database Engine Edition : Microsoft SQL Server Enterprise Edition Source Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server
Target Server Version : SQL Server 2014 Target Database Engine Edition : Unknown Target Database Engine Type : Standalone SQL Server */
SET ARITHABORT ON SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET ANSI_PADDING ON SET ANSI_WARNINGS ON SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF
CREATE SELECTIVE XML INDEX [SXI_Index] ON [dbo].[TableWithSelectiveXmlIndex] ( [xmlCol] ) WITH XMLNAMESPACES ( 'www.w3.org' as xmlnmsps1, 'onlinebookstore' as xmlnmsps2 )
FOR ( [nodePath0] = '/book/title/text()', [nodePath1] = '/book/id1' as XQUERY 'xs:string' MAXLENGTH (10), [nodePath2] = '/book/id2' as XQUERY 'node()' SINGLETON, [nodePath3] = '/book/price' as SQL [float], [SmoBaselineVerification_IndexedXmlPath] = '/book/name' as SQL [nvarchar](30) ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = OFF, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = OFF)
